TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IPGlobalStatistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 統計資料。

span.span: Provides Internet Protocol (IP) statistical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別由和方法，以傳回 IP 的流量資訊。This class is used by the and methods to return IP traffic information. 網際網路通訊協定用來將 IP 封包從來源電腦移至目的地電腦。The Internet protocol is used to move IP packets from a source computer to a destination computer. IP 也可以處理分割成較小的傳輸，分散這道程序中的多個封包太大的封包。IP also handles dividing a packet that is too large into multiple packets that are small enough for transport, in a process known as fragmentation. 此類別中的屬性與相互關聯的管理資訊基礎物件定義在 IETF RFC 2011 中的 IP。The properties in this class correlate to the Management Information Base objects for IP defined in IETF RFC 2011. ## Examples 下列程式碼的程式碼範例會顯示 IP 統計資料。The following code code example displays IP statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能由衍生自的類別可以呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DefaultTtl As Integer
public: abstract property int DefaultTtl { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包的預設存留時間 (TTL) 值。

span.span: Gets the default time-to-live (TTL) value for Internet Protocol (IP) packets.

value.span: 值，指定 TTL。

span.span: An value that specifies the TTL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TTL 值會回報為路由的節點，則會加以捨棄之前可以轉送封包數目。The TTL value is reported as the number of routing nodes that can forward a packet before it is discarded. 每個節點目前的 TTL 值減少的封包中然後再將它轉送。Each node decrements the current TTL value in a packet before forwarding it. 若 TTL 值到達零時，封包會被視為無法傳遞，並捨棄。If the TTL value reaches zero, the packet is deemed undeliverable and is discarded. 請注意，當封包從一個節點傳輸至另一個，這也稱為 「 躍點 」。Note that when a packet travels from one node to another, this is also known as a "hop". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#14)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ForwardingEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool ForwardingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指定是否已啟用網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包轉送。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether Internet Protocol (IP) packet forwarding is enabled.

value.span: 值，指定是否已啟用封包轉送。

span.span: A value that specifies whether packet forwarding is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會決定電腦是否轉送 IP 資料包中針對另一部電腦。This value determines whether the computer forwards IP datagrams destined for another computer. 通常，路由器轉送封包，且主機電腦。Typically, routers forward packets and host computers do not. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#14)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumberOfInterfaces As Integer
public: abstract property int NumberOfInterfaces { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得網路介面的數目。

span.span: Gets the number of network interfaces.

value.span: 值，包含通訊協定家族 (Family) 用來取得這個 執行個體的網路介面數目。

span.span: An value containing the number of network interfaces for the address family used to obtain this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的資料包括回送介面。The data returned by this property includes loopback interfaces. 網路介面是也稱為網路介面卡。Network interfaces are also known as network adapters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumberOfIPAddresses As Integer
public: abstract property int NumberOfIPAddresses { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得指派給本機電腦的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) addresses assigned to the local computer.

value.span: 值，指出指派給這個物件所描述之通訊協定家族 (網際網路通訊協定第 4 版或網際網路通訊協定第 6 版) 的 IP 位址數目。

span.span: An value that indicates the number of IP addresses assigned to the address family (Internet Protocol version 4 or Internet Protocol version 6) described by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的資料包括虛擬網路介面，例如通道的位址。The data returned by this property includes addresses of pseudo network interfaces such as tunnels. 如果這個執行個體已由呼叫取得，這個屬性會傳回指派給本機電腦的 IPv4 位址的數目。If this instance was obtained by calling , this property returns the number of IPv4 addresses assigned to the local computer. 同樣地，如果這個執行個體已由呼叫取得，這個屬性會傳回指派給本機電腦的 IPv6 位址的數目。Similarly, if this instance was obtained by calling , this property returns the number of IPv6 addresses assigned to the local computer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumberOfRoutes As Integer
public: abstract property int NumberOfRoutes { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 路由表中的路徑數目。

span.span: Gets the number of routes in the Internet Protocol (IP) routing table.

value.span: 值，指定路由表中的路徑總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of routes in the routing table.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputPacketRequests As Long
public: abstract property long OutputPacketRequests { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得傳出網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包的數目。

span.span: Gets the number of outbound Internet Protocol (IP) packets.

value.span: 值，指定輸出封包的總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of outgoing packets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸出封包數不包含已被轉送的封包數目。The number of outbound packets does not include the number of packets that have been forwarded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示輸出 IP 封包的統計的資料。The following code example displays statistics for outbound IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#17)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputPacketRoutingDiscards As Long
public: abstract property long OutputPacketRoutingDiscards { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已從路由表中捨棄的路徑數目。

span.span: Gets the number of routes that have been discarded from the routing table.

value.span: 值，指定已捨棄的有效路徑總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of valid routes that have been discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 捨棄的有效路由表項目一個可能的原因可能是為了釋放緩衝區空間的其他項目。One possible reason for discarding a valid routing table entry could be to free buffer space for other entries. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示輸出 IP 封包的統計的資料。The following code example displays statistics for outbound IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#17)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputPacketsDiscarded As Long
public: abstract property long OutputPacketsDiscarded { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已捨棄的傳送網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of transmitted Internet Protocol (IP) packets that have been discarded.

value.span: 值，指定已捨棄的輸出封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of outgoing packets that have been discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的資料不包含因為進行的封包無法傳送的錯誤而捨棄的封包。The data returned by this property does not include packets discarded because of errors that made the packets undeliverable. 封包包含在此資料通常會因為網路問題，例如緩衝區空間不足而捨棄。Packets included in this data are typically discarded due to network issues, such as insufficient buffer space. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示輸出 IP 封包的統計的資料。The following code example displays statistics for outbound IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#17)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputPacketsWithNoRoute As Long
public: abstract property long OutputPacketsWithNoRoute { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得本機電腦無法判斷其目的位址之路徑的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets for which the local computer could not determine a route to the destination address.

value.span: 值，指定由於找不到路徑而無法傳送的封包數目。

span.span: An value that specifies the number of packets that could not be sent because a route could not be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於此分類的 IP 封包都會被捨棄。IP packets that fall into this category are discarded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示輸出 IP 封包的統計的資料。The following code example displays statistics for outbound IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#17)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketFragmentFailures As Long
public: abstract property long PacketFragmentFailures { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得無法分散的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets that could not be fragmented.

value.span: 值，指定需要分散但具有 "Don't Fragment" 位元組的封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of packets that required fragmentation but had the "Don't Fragment" bit set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超過最大值為 IP 傳輸的封包會分割成片段，並在目的地重組。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. 這個屬性所傳回的值會指出需要分散 IP 傳輸，但可能不是，因為封包標頭可讓您指定不分散的封包的封包數目。The value returned by this property indicates the number of packets that needed to be fragmented for IP transport but could not be because the packet header specified that the packet not be fragmented. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 IP 封包重組統計的資料。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketReassembliesRequired As Long
public: abstract property long PacketReassembliesRequired { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得需要重組的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets that required reassembly.

value.span: 值，指定需要的封包重組總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of packet reassemblies required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超過最大值為 IP 傳輸的封包會分割成片段，並在目的地重組。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 IP 封包重組統計的資料。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketReassemblyFailures As Long
public: abstract property long PacketReassemblyFailures { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得未成功重組的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets that were not successfully reassembled.

value.span: 值，指定無法重組的封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of packets that could not be reassembled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超過最大值為 IP 傳輸的封包會分割成片段，並在目的地重組。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. 如果某些片段遺失或未在一段時間內到達，重組會失敗。If some fragments are lost or do not arrive within a set time, the reassembly does not succeed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 IP 封包重組統計的資料。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketReassemblyTimeout As Long
public: abstract property long PacketReassemblyTimeout { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得時間上限，網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包的所有片段都必須在該時間內到達。

span.span: Gets the maximum amount of time within which all fragments of an Internet Protocol (IP) packet must arrive.

value.span: 值，指定最大毫秒數，封包的所有片段都必須在該時間內到達才能避免遭捨棄。

span.span: An value that specifies the maximum number of milliseconds within which all fragments of a packet must arrive to avoid being discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超過最大值為 IP 傳輸的封包會分割成片段，並在目的地重組。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. 如果未在允許時間內到達所有分散 IP 封包所組成的片段，則會捨棄封包。If all fragments that make up a fragmented IP packet do not arrive within the allowed time, the packet is discarded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 IP 封包重組統計的資料。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketsFragmented As Long
public: abstract property long PacketsFragmented { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得分散的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets fragmented.

value.span: 值，指定分散的封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of fragmented packets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超過最大值為 IP 傳輸的封包會分割成片段，並在目的地重組。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 IP 封包重組統計的資料。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketsReassembled As Long
public: abstract property long PacketsReassembled { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得重組的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets reassembled.

value.span: 值，指定已成功重組的分散封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of fragmented packets that have been successfully reassembled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超過最大值為 IP 傳輸的工作階段層封包會分割成片段，並在目的地重組。Session layer packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. 如果某些片段遺失或未在一段時間內到達，重組會失敗。If some fragments are lost or do not arrive within a set time, the reassembly does not succeed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 IP 封包重組統計的資料。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPackets As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPackets { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 IP 封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of IP packets received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的值會包含在錯誤中收到的封包。The value returned by this property includes packets received in error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示針對已接收 IP 封包的統計資料。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsDelivered { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已傳遞的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets delivered.

value.span: 值，指定已傳遞的 IP 封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of IP packets delivered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的值包括網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMP) 訊息。The value returned by this property includes Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) messages. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示針對已接收 IP 封包的統計資料。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsDiscarded As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsDiscarded { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到並捨棄的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets that have been received and discarded.

value.span: 值，指定已捨棄的傳入封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of incoming packets that have been discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的值會包含已捨棄，即使它們未包含錯誤，導致無法重組] 或 [傳送這些封包。The value returned by this property includes only those packets that were discarded even though they did not contain errors that prevented reassembly or delivery. 一般而言，此類別中的封包都會被捨棄，因為緩衝區空間不足。Typically, packets in this category are discarded because of insufficient buffer space. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示針對已接收 IP 封包的統計資料。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsForwarded As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsForwarded { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已轉送的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets forwarded.

value.span: 值，指定已轉送的封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of forwarded packets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果本機電腦不是路由器，此屬性所傳回的值會包含已成功來源路由從本機電腦傳送的封包。If the local computer is not a router, the value returned by this property includes packets that were successfully source-routed via the local computer. 來源路徑是讓封包的來源可以在這裡指定的目的地位址的路由的 IP 選項。Source routing is an IP option whereby the source of the packet can specify the route to the destination address. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示針對已接收 IP 封包的統計資料。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsWithAddressErrors As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsWithAddressErrors { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到且具有位址錯誤的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets with address errors that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到且在標頭位址部分有錯誤的 IP 封包總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of IP packets received with errors in the address portion of the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的值會包含位址捨棄的封包相關的標頭欄位，例如無效的位址中的問題。The value returned by this property includes packets discarded for address related issues in the header fields, such as invalid addresses. 如果未啟用封包轉送，這個屬性所傳回的值會包含已被丟棄，因為目的地位址不是本機位址的封包。If packet forwarding is not enabled, the value returned by this property includes packets that were discarded because the destination address was not a local address. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示針對已接收 IP 封包，但發生錯誤的統計資料。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets with errors. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsWithHeadersErrors As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsWithHeadersErrors { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到且具有標頭錯誤的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets with header errors that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到但因標頭中的錯誤而遭捨棄的 IP 封包數目。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of IP packets received and discarded due to errors in the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的值包含非位址中的標頭欄位，例如不正確的總和檢查碼的相關問題的捨棄封包、 超過的存留時間值和不正確的 IP 選項。The value returned by this property includes packets discarded for non-address related issues in the header fields, such as bad checksums, time-to-live value exceeded, and incorrect IP options. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示針對已接收 IP 封包，但發生錯誤的統計資料。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets with errors. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsWithUnknownProtocol As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsWithUnknownProtocol { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已在本機電腦 (Local Machine) 上收到，且標頭中含有未知通訊協定的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets received on the local machine with an unknown protocol in the header.

value.span: 值，指定已收到且具有未知通訊協定的 IP 封包總數。

span.span: An value that indicates the total number of IP packets received with an unknown protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IP 標頭中的 [通訊協定] 欄位表示 IP 資料包的資料部分中所使用的下一個層級通訊協定。The protocol field in the IP header indicates the next-level protocol used in the data portion of the IP datagram. 如果無法辨識的通訊協定，不能將資料傳遞到正確的應用程式。If the protocol is not recognized, the data cannot be passed to the correct application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示針對已接收 IP 封包，但發生錯誤的統計資料。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets with errors. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#16)]
